name: com.outsystems.plugins.healthfitness
description: iOS Unit Tests for the plugin HealthFitness

scripts.test: xcodebuild -scheme Cordova && xcodebuild test -scheme HealthFitnessLibTests -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone 6' | xcpretty --report junit --report html && exit ${PIPESTATUS[0]}

author: OutSystems Inc
